test.lecture_number = #{lectureNumber}

SELECT de_sub_name_by_lecture(lecture_number) AS detail_subject_name , (EXTRACT(DAY FROM limit_time) * 24 * 60) + (EXTRACT(HOUR FROM limit_time) * 60) + (EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM limit_time)) AS minute , question.question_number , text , score , attachment_file FROM paper_content JOIN question ON paper_content.question_number = question.question_number JOIN test ON paper_content.paper_number = test.paper_number WHERE test.test_number = #{testNumber}
SELECT original_file_name , file_path FROM attachment_file WHERE question_number = #{questionNumber}
SELECT option1 AS option_one , option2 AS option_two , option3 AS option_three , option4 AS option_four , option5 AS option_five FROM question WHERE question_number = #{questionNumber}
